original_title: The Australian Pink Floyd Show - Everything under the sun
overview: The concert was filmed progressively over the 'Best of the Best' tour in the spring of 2016 in Germany but the bulk of the material was filmed in the last week of the tour, playing in many great venues including the famous Festhalle in Frankfurt, a venue that Pink Floyd themselves performed 'Animals'. A cinematic approach was taken to produce a film of a concert which we hope will give much enjoyment to the viewer and listener.
tagline: The Australian Pink Floyd Show - Everything Under The Sun
title: The Australian Pink Floyd Show - Everything Under The Sun
